ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgnrg.h | |- H = ( G |`s A ) |

| 3 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` G ) -> A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |

| 6 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. NrmRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` G ) ) -> A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |

| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` H ) = ( norm ` H ) |

| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. NrmRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` G ) ) -> ( norm ` H ) = ( ( norm ` G ) |` A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( AbsVal ` G ) = ( AbsVal ` G ) |

| 14 | 11, 1, 13 | #P_abvres | |- ( ( ( norm ` G ) e. ( AbsVal ` G ) /\ A e. ( SubRing ` G ) ) -> ( ( norm ` G ) |` A ) e. ( AbsVal ` H ) ) |

| 18 | 5, 16, 17 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( G e. NrmRing /\ A e. ( SubRing ` G ) ) -> H e. NrmRing ) |
